item.title: Boston Housing
item.description: Model Evaluation & Validation Project: Predicting Boston Housing Prices Getting Started In this project, you will evaluate the performance and predictive power of a model that has been trained and tested on data collected from homes in suburbs of Boston, Massachusetts. A model trained on this data that is seen as a good fit could then be used to make certain predictions about a home â€” in particular, its monetary value.
